{{ja|orig}} {{lang|ja|{{ruby|谷山|たにやま}} {{ruby|豊|ゆたか}}|Taniyama Yutaka}} {{ipa|ja|ta.ꜛni.ja.ma jɯꜜ.ta.ka}} {{audio|ja-JP-taniyama-yutaka.mp3}} {{note|1}}

notes.en: Japanese Wikipedia: {{link|https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/谷山豊|{{lang|ja|谷山豊}}}}. According to this article, the given name “{{lang|ja|豊}}” should be read as “Toyo”, but many people misread it as “Yutaka”, so one day he began to call himself “Yutaka”.

remark-norwegian-pitch.en: Superscript numbers indicate the pitch accent. See Wikipedia: {{link|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norwegian_phonology#Accent|Norwegian phonology – Accent}}.
remark-norwegian-pitch.zh: 上标数字表示声调。参见英语维基百科：{{link|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norwegian_phonology#Accent|Norwegian phonology – Accent}}.

remark-swedish-pitch.en: Superscript numbers indicate the pitch accent. The Swedish pitch accent is explained in this {{link|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lXp7_Sjgm34|video}}.
remark-swedish-pitch.zh: 上标数字表示声调。这个{{link|https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lXp7_Sjgm34|视频}}介绍了瑞典语的声调。
